readable.title: 3159424456_f316bdc1d5
readable.content: A baby is held by an adult and is sitting on a table at a coffee shop . A man holds a baby on the table at a restaurant . A man in glasses has his arm around a baby in orange and yellow that has foam on her nose . An adult holds a small child who sits on a table in a mall food court . Man in glasses holding a toddler on the table at a restaurant .
